This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] mouse boundary events when the <area> is resized
  assert_equals: expected "[mouseover@area#area1-1, mouseenter@div#container, mouseenter@map#map1, mouseenter@area#area1-1, mousemove@area#area1-1, mouseout@area#area1-1, mouseleave@area#area1-1, mouseleave@map#map1, mouseover@img#img1, mouseenter@img#img1, mouseout@img#img1, mouseleave@img#img1, mouseleave@div#container]" but got "[mouseover@area#area1-1, mouseenter@div#container, mouseenter@map#map1, mouseenter@area#area1-1, mousemove@area#area1-1, mouseout@area#area1-1, mouseleave@area#area1-1, mouseleave@map#map1, mouseleave@div#container]"
[FAIL] mouse boundary events when usemap is modified
  assert_equals: expected "[mouseover@area#area1-1, mouseenter@div#container, mouseenter@map#map1, mouseenter@area#area1-1, mousemove@area#area1-1, mouseout@area#area1-1, mouseleave@area#area1-1, mouseleave@map#map1, mouseover@area#area2-1, mouseenter@map#map2, mouseenter@area#area2-1, mouseout@area#area2-1, mouseleave@area#area2-1, mouseleave@map#map2, mouseleave@div#container]" but got "[mouseover@area#area1-1, mouseenter@div#container, mouseenter@map#map1, mouseenter@area#area1-1, mousemove@area#area1-1, mouseout@area#area1-1, mouseleave@area#area1-1, mouseleave@map#map1, mouseleave@div#container]"
[FAIL] mouse boundary events when new <area> is available
  assert_equals: expected "[mouseover@area#area1-1, mouseenter@div#container, mouseenter@map#map1, mouseenter@area#area1-1, mousemove@area#area1-1, mouseout@area#area1-1, mouseleave@area#area1-1, mouseover@area#area1-2, mouseenter@area#area1-2, mouseout@area#area1-2, mouseleave@area#area1-2, mouseleave@map#map1, mouseleave@div#container]" but got "[mouseover@area#area1-1, mouseenter@div#container, mouseenter@map#map1, mouseenter@area#area1-1, mousemove@area#area1-1, mouseout@area#area1-1, mouseleave@area#area1-1, mouseleave@map#map1, mouseleave@div#container]"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
